Welcome!

Hi! Welcome to my new site! This website is currently a work in progress. This website exists as my personal home on the internet where I can post about my daily life, projects, hobbies, poetry, and cool stuff I’ve found on the internet.

If you’d like to make a website like this, check out my web dev resources.

Sitemap

Home: The landing/home page for my website.

Categories: My posts divided into different categories.

   Blog: Posts about my life and stuff.

   Hobbies: Posts about hobbies I enjoy.

   Posts: This shows all posts ever made.

   Projects: Projects I’ve worked on.

Misc: For stuff that doesn’t quite fit anywhere else.
